name: DevOps Fundamentals
description: This phase covers DevOps fundamentals - the practices and tools that enable teams to deliver software faster and more reliably. You'll learn containerization, CI/CD pipelines, Infrastructure as Code, and monitoring.
short_description: Master Docker containers, Kubernetes orchestration, CI/CD pipelines, Terraform IaC, and monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana.

capstone.title: DevOps Capstone Project
capstone.summary: Apply DevOps practices end-to-end on your Journal API: containerization, automation, infrastructure as code, and orchestration.
includes: Containerize your application and publish an image
Build a CI/CD pipeline that runs reliably

hands_on_verification.summary: Submit proof that you've built real DevOps artifacts that can be validated automatically.
includes: Publish a public container image for your app
Show a successful GitHub Actions workflow run
Include Terraform config in an infra/ directory
Include Kubernetes manifests in a k8s/ directory

prerequisites: This phase builds on the project from previous phases
